name: Pong! Blitz
description:
Pong! Blitz is a game with the original Pong! game by Atari, and powerups as well!

Buy any power ups you want!

Face off a computer.

Reach the high score! (Internet required)

NOTE: Pong! is a game made by Atari, and not me. I just want to make this project, because I usually miss Tetris Blitz. It was fun!
